The Major is the bag Ursack is best known for, the original bear-resistant soft-sided food container.'}, {'url': 'https://www.garagegrowngear.com/blogs/gear-gab/ursack-all-mitey-review-bear-safety', 'content': "The Good To Knows You Can Pair Ursack with Other Bear Safety Measures - On a recent backpacking trip undertaken by only myself and my 8-year-old daughter into the heart of Yellowstone's bear country, we layered our safety measures. We used an Opsak smell proof bag inside the Ursack All Mitey, and then we set a proper bear hang — the Park Service provided the pole, so this one was super legit."}, {'url': 'https://www.ultimategearlists.com/gear-reviews/ursack-allmitey-bear-bag', 'content': 'DURABILITY: The AllMitey was only deemed market-ready after thorough product testing involving actual bears. So max durability is kind of implied — it is the bag\'s key selling point. The critter-proof fabrics provide more durability than any other soft-sided bear bag, resulting in a true "buy it for life" item.'}, {'url': 'https://sectionhiker.com/ursack-allmitey-bear-bag-backpacking-review/', 'content': "Recommendation. The Ursack AllMitey is a bear-proof and critter-proof bag that can be used to protect your food while you sleep on backpacking and camping trips. It's far more reliable, faster and easier to use than hanging a bear bag in a tree with a 5o' length of cord and a rock."}, {'url': 'https://thetrek.co/gear-review-the-ursack/', 'content': '3. Durability. Ursack\'s "bullet-proof" fabric has shown itself to be extremely effective at keeping bear teeth and claws at bay.
